topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55948fcb6368725e6b00000c#post_55948fcb6368725e6b00000c
It's the juxtaposition of super serious crime drama dealing with international drug dealers and a very interesting antagonist who's motivations are very well executed and clear and the goofiness of fucking NINJAS. Imagine you were watching Law & Order and suddenly Cthulhu showed up and the cops had to fight him with eldirtch magic.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
